name: Merry Fragmas
description:
Controls:

  • Look: Mouse look
  • Fire: Mouse1
  • Aim: Mouse2
  • Movement: WASD
  • Sprint: Hold left shift
  • Exit: Alt-F4

I created this game by following a Unity live training session (recorded).

Link to part 1: http://unity3d.com/learn/tutorials/modules/interme...
